meanings: (답·계산·사실 등이) (잘못되다) be wrong, be incorrect, be mistaken; (잘못하다) make a mistake (in), commit[make] an error (in)
의견 말하기 I see we have our differences.
의견 말하기 We're not seeing eye to eye on the matter.
의견 말하기 There seems to be a disagreement.

vlive.korean: 고기 한 조각 두 조각 이제 크기에 따라서 틀려 요. I'll add one or two pieces of meat, depending on the size. 듣기 View video JTBC PLUS : [취중돌] 뉴이스트W랑 랜선 바베큐파티 🐢🐶🐯🐰
vlive.english: I'll add one or two pieces of meat, depending on the size.

vlive.korean: 내 말이 틀려? Am I wrong? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 벽과 벽 사이 [가두리횟집] EP07
형 왜 다 틀려? Why are you make so many mistakes? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] NU'NIVERSITY : 타자의 이해와 실습

vlive.korean: 넌 무슨 갔던 길을 틀려? How can you not know your way? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 짝사랑이 이루어질 수 있을까 [연애미수] EP09

examples.korean: What do you mean, it's not right? 발음듣기 무슨 말이에요, 그게 틀려요? User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 쥬쥬(cers****) Web Collection
